author: Fourty Seven
comment: Looks great :) good to see things fixed and working again! Im extremely satisfied with the dev talking to me and communicating with its users! Problems im experiencing right now: opening calender (left) crashes the face. And the weather (right) resets the location and will not hold a set location! Again, happy the dev is constantly looking to better the face and im sure it will be fixed soon!

reply.author: Andrei Licsandru
reply.content: Fixed & generously updated in v2.1! Give it a go!

title: Loving it, but..

author: Ovidiu CONEAC
comment: Great application. Love it. Nice touch with the German language.  You might think of improving the colors and fonts settings, because they currently are very counter-intuitive.  Also, there appears to be a bug setting the "enable ambient color". It does not automatically update the ambient color for letters after the color for letters in active mode was changed.

author: Torrey Trahanovsky
comment: Amazing app best thing I could have ever asked for! Sadly the calendar on the left caused the face to crash, then pressing it a second time causes the face to completely reset the weather and switch to the factor face. I am using a Asus ZenWatch 3. Please fix! Thank you :)
title: Amazing but...

comment: Hi, great watch face! Your new update keeps crashing on my Moto 360 though. Anyway of going back to the previous version? I preferred the layout and time display also. Thanks.

author: Cyber F4n
comment: Bravo!!! But it has a problem, at least on Sony sw3. Everytime I go to its settings the weather location is changing back to Bucharest. For those with the calendar problem, you have an app that is drawing over the apps (wear mini launcher for example). Disable it set the permissions for the watch face and then reinstall / enable the other app. This is a bug I think from the OS. It happens on other apps as well.
title: Great

author: Paul Bryden-Bradley
comment: Doesn't ask to get calendar permission, just crashes when you left tap. Changing weather location is also not working.
title: Calendar crashes

author: Juan José López Juárez
comment: Settings keep getting reset every time i open the app. And big numbers in german get too close to the border. Also I don't like the new update. It just show 50 in stead 10 to X.  I like it before the update.

author: Stephen Coleman
comment: I love this watch face, but the weather doesn't seem to want to accept my location and the email address in the about screen came back failed to deliver. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Once weather works, 5 stars.
title: I love the design

author: Nick Burgess
comment: It works now because my watch updated but the calendar function causes a crash and I can't seem to change the location for weather

author: Michael La Cognata
comment: great looking but buggy, sent a message to dev and he never replied.  Settings keep resetting, force quits when tapping on calendar.

author: Ivor Henry
comment: Since update not working or showing up on my moto360 or Motorola fone please advise have sent u an email today....
title: Not working anymore please fix

author: austin russell
comment: It looks good, it's simple, and it tells me the time. That more do ya need? 😄
title: Nice work

author: Don Zurenko
comment: Constantly crashes on my watch urbane....too bad really looks cool after several reinstalls I give up....just too buggy weather and calender don't work just crashes the whole thing...too bad it looks cool ...very cool
title: Crash!

author: Jeremy Dubicki
comment: I would give this watch face a five except that the settings still do not stay set on my Huawei. Once this is fixed it will be pretty perfect.

author: Stuart Lathrop
comment: This watch face continues to improve with each release! Props to the developer who actually listens to the user base and adds features that are wanted!
title: Continually improving...

author: Jean-Charles Renaud
comment: Huawei issues have been fixed. Watch face is great now and works perfectly now. Thanks for updating it.

reply.author: Andrei Licsandru
reply.content: Everything works great now, give it another shot!

author: palindrome414
comment: The new look and features rock. Thanks.
title: Love the update

author: Marquita Davis
comment: Just upgraded to the S6 Edge Plus and this app no longer works. This blows because I absolutely love this clock. Maybe soon it'll be fixed or it should be noted that it wont work on certain phones. Until then, only one star from me.

reply.author: Andrei Licsandru
reply.content: Version 2.1 is up, let me know if it works now!

title: Used to love this app...

author: Chen Way Siew
comment: Love the watch face, but discovered a small bug that happens at 8 (AM / PM). Whenever the time is "something" past eight, and there's a notification card, the time will say seven instead of eight. Pulling the notification card down to reveal the whole watch face would get the seven to change to eight.

reply.author: Andrei Licsandru
reply.content: Hi Chen, thank you for the feedback. I will look into it asap :)

author: David DeVoe
comment: i want to give 5 stars, but it's a special class of application that gets 5. i think what might have pushed it further into that territory would be more options (fonts, date arrangements, etc). great work tho. worth the dollar paid.
title: Great

author: rex lloyd
comment: Would give 5 stars if it centred on the Huawei watch please fix.. will probably unistall if not

reply.author: Andrei Licsandru
reply.content: It's all working great now in version 2.1!

title: Not centred on huawei watch

author: Matthew Wheeler
comment: Love it, but can't get the animated battery level to display on Moto 360.

reply.author: Andrei Licsandru
reply.content: Matthew, I will look into it asap!

title: Almost

author: David Traumann
comment: Neat new features after updating to V 2.0

reply.author: Andrei Licsandru
reply.content: David, hold tight! I will look into it asap!

title: Very nice after the update

author: Bruce Williams
comment: This was what I've been looking for. Love the text withing the body of text. Had to get used to double checking the dots, but you get it pretty quickly. One thing I'd like to see would be 24 hour time, but even with great work! (Update: per developer reply it makes sense on why there isn't a 24 hour option [too many words to display]. Still a great watch face)

reply.author: Andrei Licsandru
reply.content: Thank you for your kind words, Bruce! Regarding the 24h time, I cannot do that, because there would be too many words necessary and I would have to make the letter very, very small :) Regards

title: Love the Watch Face

author: Daniel Golightly
comment: Looks great! I would love to see some options to display phone battery details and a few other things. But it's great as is. The simplicity of this gives it a sophistication that's missing from many watch faces. Looks great on my Zenwatch.

reply.author: Andrei Licsandru
reply.content: Thank you for the review! It was great talking to you! Regards

title: Love the Simplicity.

author: Harold Montano
comment: I like this even better!
title: Hate numbers! Lol

author: john dalton Agpalo
comment: I hope i can have a refund. Its good but boring. Cant do anything or change text.

reply.author: Andrei Licsandru
reply.content: New update should be available in a couple of hours. I'm sure you'll like it a lot now!

title: Good but boring

author: Isaiah Berryhill
comment: Doesn't work on the Gear S.

reply.author: Andrei Licsandru
reply.content:
Hi Isaiah,
As far as I am aware, the Gear S runs Tizen OS. Time in Words requires Android Wear 5.0+.
Regards

author: Michael Hudson
comment: Simple and yet eye catching. Lots of compliments already.

author: André Diazzi
comment: Great work
title: Excelent

author: Husani Redding
comment: Love the watchface
title: Nice Watchface

comment: Just awesome!

author: Paris Harris
comment: There could be lots of watch faces in the play store, but none of them class of this, it's been my favorite since installing it. To make more readable one should have darkened the background little bit, otherwise the watch face is just fantastic.
title: A class watch face, worth every penny.

author: M Masud
comment: Worth for the money, this watch face looks fantastic with my round smartwatch. "Time In Words Watch Face" is one of the best watch faces in the Android market. I would really love to recommend this app.
title: Just awesome.

author: Maria Lee
comment: The watch is great designed and real battery saver. This is what I expected android wear to deliver. I really appreciate the Dev.
title: Finally found something cool.

author: Rafael Diaz
comment: Next update can the time really show the correct time?

reply.author: Andrei Licsandru
reply.content:
Hi Rafael!
The watchface shows the correct time from the first version. You have to take into account the dots at the bottom of the screen, they represent 1 minute increments. Check the pictures above for reference!
Regards!

title: Great

author: Brian Saunders
comment: Simple. Elegant in a way. Perfect.
title: Love it.

author: perry farmer
comment: While I would like to have the option to get rid of it everywhere it appears this option is buggy for the ambient screen. Select another watch face and 'it is' is back until you set the color again.

reply.author: Andrei Licsandru
reply.content:
Hello, Perry!
I released an update to deal with this problem. Check out version 1.3.2!
Regards

title: Would like to get rid of 'it is'

author: Danny McFarland
comment: I stumbled upon the Qlocktwo watch online, and it looked awesome, which it should for $900. After looking for a knockoff replica of the original watch, I came up empty handed. Then I purchased the Moto 360, and came across this watch face. I now have the look of the $900 watch for only a buck! Very nice!
title: Perfect Qlocktwo replica

author: Nicholas Carvalho
comment: The look is very polished and we'll done. many other watch faces on here look good in the pictures but terrible on the watch. Glad to see some developers not only putting real effort into the watch faces but also responding to comments. Well worth the money

reply.author: Andrei Licsandru
reply.content:
Much appreciated! Update is coming in a few days with some really nice features!
Regards

title: Far better than alternatives
